message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to make a serious offer. I can pay $9,000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value. However, I'm looking for something closer to $11,000 for this product.  It's a very unique item.

I understand that the product is unique, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $11,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500 for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
